tags.name: users
tags.description: Operations available to regular, logged in users

post.description: user supplies user name and password and receives a json web token
user supplies email and password to register and receives a json web token.

get.description: user supplies valid token and receives all user info

put.description: user supplies valid token and updates all user info

200.description: successful authentication user photo json object

get.summary: Returns the list of ALL users. Must be admin to call.
get.description: Returns the list of ALL users. Must be admin to call.

403.description: No token provided or invalid token.

delete.description: Delete a user identified by unique ID

post.description: Upload image file as user picture

get.description: List all pictures created by the user

delete.description: Delete picture via its unique ID
